scripts.db-tests: dropdb --if-exists rm3unit && createdb rm3unit && psql rm3unit < db-schema.sql && ./node_modules/.bin/tape tests/db/*.js
scripts.test: npm run unit-tests && npm run db-tests
scripts.coverage: dropdb --if-exists rm3unit && createdb rm3unit && psql rm3unit < db-schema.sql && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/tape tests/unit/*.js tests/db/*.js
